Package org.autogui.swing.log

Class GuiSwingLogEntryException

java.lang.Object
org.autogui.base.log.GuiLogEntryException
org.autogui.swing.log.GuiSwingLogEntryException
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuiLogEntry, GuiSwingLogEntry
public class GuiSwingLogEntryException extends GuiLogEntryException implements GuiSwingLogEntry
a log-entry for an exception with supporting GUI rendering

  • Method Details

    • sizeCache

      public float[] sizeCache(Object r, Supplier<float[]> src)
      Description copied from interface: GuiSwingLogEntry
      obtains cached layout-size or computes it by the size. the default impl. is just always computing as no caching. available by 
            SizeCache c = new SizeCache(2);
      float[] sizeCache(Object k, Supplier src) {
          return c.computeIfAbsent(k, _k -> src.get());
      }
      Specified by:
      sizeCache in interface GuiSwingLogEntry
      Parameters:
      r - the key for the size
      src - the task for computing the size
      Returns:
      the layout-size, {w,h}
